function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of data on individual area of supermarkets and shopping malls","Impact":"Inaccurate spatial catchment analysis, potential underestimation of disease propagation","Mitigation":"Acquire data on individual area of supermarkets and shopping malls to improve spatial catchment analysis","Technologies":"Geospatial mapping and data collection technologies","People":"Researchers, urban planners","Owner":"Research institutions, local government"}]}
